channel.title: Just another newb needing help
channel.description:
Ok, I just discovered MoparScape.
... How the hell do I get it to work? :o
Can anyone explain to me , clearly, step by step, what I should do in order to play MoparScape? Remember, I have zero knowledge on basically anything related to it, so telling me the _____ has to _____ probably won't help at all.

item.title: Just another newb needing help
item.dc:creator: @MoparUnited MoparUnited
item.description:
@MoparUnited wrote:

If you know runescape and the java runtime,there should be no concern with the moparscape 3.2 too you.

Read full topic

item.title: Just another newb needing help
item.dc:creator: @grr_pker grr pker
item.description:
@grr_pker wrote:

ok download Moparscape v3.2 with Aryan from forums’
then go to www.Moparscape.org/serverstatus.php
then find a server you think your like then go to the moparscape server at top click file
and the first one and enter the I.P
then use any name and Password
I’ts been great helping you have a great day

Read full topic
